subclusters.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
Lysosomal and Autophagy-Related Cellular Senescence Theory
Progenitor Cell Senescence and Tissue Regeneration Decline Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress as a primary driver of cellular senescence and aging via ROS/RONS imbalance and antioxidant defense failure.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes oxidative stress as a trigger of neuronal senescence and brain aging, linking ROS damage to senescence mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights oxidative damage accelerating senescence in skin aging, with ROS-induced DNA and telomere damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence induction by multiple stressors including oxidative stress, with SASP and apoptosis resistance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Includes macromolecular damage such as DNA breaks and oxidative stress as key drivers of senescence and inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA damage and genomic instability including aneuploidy as mechanisms driving senescence, often linked to oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: MicroRNA regulation of senescence pathways including DNA damage response and telomere shortening, processes often linked to oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence induction by genotoxic damage and mitochondrial dysfunction, both related to oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes molecular pathways reinforcing senescence including p16INK4a and NF-κB, downstream of oxidative and genotoxic stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescence in immune cells, SASP-driven chronic inflammation, and immune dysfunction as drivers of aging and autoimmunity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescent microglia/macrophages in CNS lesions secreting SASP factors that impair remyelination and promote inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Senescence of multiple CNS immune and glial cell types with SASP promoting inflammation and disease progression in multiple sclerosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: General theory emphasizing senescent cell accumulation, SASP-driven inflammation, apoptosis resistance, and senolytic interventions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links cellular senescence and SASP to chronic inflammation and frailty, highlighting systemic inflammatory burden.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on irreversible growth arrest, SASP secretion, and senolytic therapies targeting inflammation-driven aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details SASP proteomic profile and its systemic inflammatory effects driving aging traits and pathologies.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescent cell accumulation and SASP-driven chronic inflammation causing tissue dysfunction in the eye.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Inflammation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Vascular senescence with SASP disrupts blood-brain barrier integrity and promotes inflammation in Alzheimer's disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lysosomal and Autophagy-Related Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on TFEB/TFE3-driven lysosomal biogenesis as essential for senescent cell survival and SASP regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lysosomal and Autophagy-Related Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Cholesterol accumulation induces senescence via lysosomal ABCA1 trafficking dysfunction and mTORC1 activation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lysosomal and Autophagy-Related Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: SUV39H1-mediated heterochromatin regulation affects genome stability and senescence, linking chromatin state to lysosomal/autophagy pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lysosomal and Autophagy-Related Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: p53 isoform regulation of senescence involves DNA repair and autophagy-related protein degradation pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lysosomal and Autophagy-Related Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Δ133p53 isoform inhibits astrocyte senescence and neurotoxicity, implicating autophagy and proteostasis in senescence regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Progenitor Cell Senescence and Tissue Regeneration Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Senescence of progenitor cells impairs tissue repair and promotes fibrosis, highlighting stem cell exhaustion mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Progenitor Cell Senescence and Tissue Regeneration Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Senescent alveolar epithelial progenitors contribute to idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis via SASP and stem cell exhaustion.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Progenitor Cell Senescence and Tissue Regeneration Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: BMAL1-AP-1 interaction modulates senescence programming affecting chromatin and gene expression, impacting tissue regeneration.
